title: How do placement matches calculate your elo?
body: I would just like to know how placement matches determine what your elo.  I am currently going through some placement matches and I seem rather confused. I mean, what if you lose every match but you are like 20 and 0 in every single one. I would also like to know how tower kills play into the mix and what the most important thing is.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=XxAaronEclipsexX,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=8nx90EAl,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-07-29T13:20:14.627+0000)
>
> I would just like to know how placement matches determine what your elo.  I am currently going through some placement matches and I seem rather confused. I mean, what if you lose every match but you are like 20 and 0 in every single one. I would also like to know how tower kills play into the mix and what the most important thing is.

Placement matches, just like any other Ranked matches, only consider whether you won or lost the game. Nothing else matters, neither your KDA nor your tower kills.

Just keep in mind that for your first placement series ever, your starting skill, before playing your first game, is assumed to be around Silver 4. For the following seasons, they consider the rank you had at the end of the previous seasons.

Your placement matches are mostly based off whether you won or lost the games. Keep in mind that if you placed in the previous season, that MMR will hold some weight and your new MMR will be calculated based on your placements matches vs your old rank. Hit up our [**Ranked Play FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760#h2q1) to read through the rest of the details.
